input.name: app
input.label: Select app
input.help-text: If selected, app key and version are displayed

input.name: bgcolor
input.label: Background color
input.help-text: Valid CSS colors: HTML hex values with hashtag ("#2244fa" etc), color names ("darkred" etc) or rgb / rgba values

input.name: width
input.label: Width of the label
input.help-text: Width across the label band, in px

input.name: cornerDist
input.label: Distance from corner
input.help-text: Distance in px, from the corner to the closest edge of the label

input.name: fixed
input.label: Fixed
input.help-text: Sticky position in the corner; stay visible when scrolling the page

input.name: edit
input.label: Content Studio Edit mode
input.help-text: Display over the preview in edit mode (logged-in console admins)

input.name: preview
input.label: Preview mode
input.help-text: Display over unpublished preview, and in XP 6: also the Content Studio browse preview (logged-in console admins)

input.name: inline
input.label: Content Studio Inline mode (only XP 7)
input.help-text: Display over the browse mode preview in Content Studio in XP 7 (logged-in console admins, all content)

input.name: live
input.label: Live
input.help-text: Display live (NO LOGIN, published content. If used in a prod environment, end users will see the watermark!)
